title: 120ms and i can't even move Ty Rito
body:
i've got 120 ms and i can't even move and chatting is too lagging 
pls help me on that :/

replies.body:
If you can't issue commands to your champion and everything else seems incredibly laggy as well, it is possible that you have some packet loss on your connection or the connection itself is inherently unstable.  In order to get a better idea of what the root cause is, make sure to use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  It should give you a health report on your connection, and the steps you can take to help improve it.

Let me know if you have any other questions!
